attributes.action: Fair pay for health care assistances
attributes.additional_details: Were doing just as much as we can to keep people safe and it seems working in a residential home they keep a better pay than we do all I want for HCA is a fair pay a living wage
attributes.background: After all the work were doing in nursing home to keep the most vulnerable safe £8.73 is a kick in the teeth

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government is also not responsible for the pay of all healthcare workers, many of whom are employed privately.
